description: China is contemplating a drastic plan to move 250 million rural residents into towns and cities over the next dozen years.
title: A Chinese Push for Urbanization
title_page: A Chinese Push for Urbanization - The New York Times
text: Li Rui, 60, scavenged his former village for building materials in Liaocheng. Mr. Li was a farmer until three years ago, when the local government razed his village for an urban development zone.
